Question: Aesonic Electronics Co.,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Aesonic Electronics Co.,Ltd

ANC-007

- Active noise cancellation technology
- Dual diaphragm horn for enhanced acoustic experience
- Bluetooth connectivity for wireless usage

TWS-003

- True wireless design
- High-quality sound with dual drivers
- Bluetooth 5.0 for stable connectivity

BL-002

- Lightweight and portable design
- High-fidelity sound output
- Comfortable fit for extended usage

BL-003

- Ergonomic earbud design
- Noise isolation for immersive experience
- Built-in microphone for hands-free calls

BL-001

- Stylish and compact earphone
- Enhanced bass and treble response
- Tangle-free cable for convenience

BL-005

- Bone-conduction technology for unique listening experience
- Open-ear design for ambient sound awareness
- Sweat-resistant for sports and outdoor activities

BL-006

- In-ear earplug design for noise reduction
- Suitable for outdoor use
- Compact and portable

BL-008

- Hybrid earpiece design for versatile usage
- Balanced sound output
- Sleek and modern appearance
